title: Refer-A-Friend not available on Oceania. Why?
body:
At first when I came here I thought the missing features would still get implemented. Not just game modes but stuff like the Refer A Friend program. And while seemingly there aren't enough players for some game modes to be played on Oceania, why isn't there the Refer-a-friend feature from all the other servers? Especially with this relatively few amount of players on the server.

TL;DR: Give us the incentive to refer friends.

replies.body:
They don't pay as much attention to OCE as they do NA, simple. We really only get stuff that was released on NA as well.

Name one feature that we have which NA doesn't. Inversely, name all the features NA have that we don't.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EVqAhk9y,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-05T22:44:30.644+0000)
>
> They don't pay as much attention to OCE as they do NA, simple. We really only get stuff that was released on NA as well.
> 
> Name one feature that we have which NA doesn't. Inversely, name all the features NA have that we don't.

Of course.
It works like that for all servers.
The main Riot team is the one from NA. Their headquarters are in California.
The other server's staffs are basically just there to adapt whatever Riot releases, manage their community and maintain their server.
But even Riot NA doesn't have THAT much of a say, since the huge Chinese corporation of Tencent directs Riot NA. That's just how the hierarchy is built up for Riot.

But features (which NA has) and we weirdly don't is pretty lame and it doesn't even make any sense since most servers have for example dominion game mode or are able to refer friends. It's really only Oceania players that get screwed over.
